TopicTitle: Ladder mods? Non-animated longer then Pegasus I or arched?

Articles.Content:
Are there mods that provide 2m, 4m, 5m and 6m ladder lengths, non-animated like the Pegasus I stock ladder? Something to make it easier to strap ladders up/down the side of the craft for times when the Telus-LV is overkill?

Also in need of a radial mounted ladder designed for 2.5m tanks. It should work similar to the KW's TRQ or SY's external reaction wheels where it comes in a 180 degree arc segment (or 90 degree arcs). The goal is that the Kerbal should be able to use S/W keys to move around the perimeter.
How about handrails? (they work like ladders)

B9 has some block ladders that have built in lights.

Though I think one day those ladders will be treated like pipes and struts, in that you can specify two ends and you can go between them.
